{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Khadas |model=Vim |revision=Pro 1.2 |asin=B07CWTGBLB |price=65 |est_release_date=11/2016 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Shenzhen Wesion Tech |manuf_model=GVim |availability=currently shipping |type=media player |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=USB Type-C |cpu1_brand=Amlogic |cpu1_model=S905X |cpu1_cspeed=1.5 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=16 GiB |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=KLMAG2WEPD-B031 |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B4G1646E-BCMA |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, Micro SD Card slot, |expansion_usb_num=2 |serial=yes,, (115200,8,N,1),, |wi1_module=AMPAK AP6255 |wi1_module_if=SDIO |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43455 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |flags=Bluetooth 4.2, HDMI 2.0a, RTC, GPIO, IR remote, |stock_boot=U-Boot;2015.01;g101afee |stock_os=Linux;3.14.29;Android 6.0.1; |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |oui=44:2C:05 |oui_eth=44:2C:05 }} {{TagLine|Open Source DIY Box}} :[http://khadas.com/vim/ Product Page] {{•}} [http://docs.khadas.com/ Documentation]
===Wikis=== * [http://forum.khadas.com/ Khadas Community] * [http://freaktab.com/forum/tv-player-support/amlogic-based-tv-players/s905x/610101-khadas-vim-tv-box-amlogic-s905x-quad-core-one-for-the-geek Freaktab.com] ===Source=== *[https://github.com/khadas GitHub] ===Reviews=== *[http://www.cnx-software.com/2016/11/17/khadas-vim-amlogic-s905x-android-and-linux-development-board-sells-for-50-and-up/ ''Khadas Vim Amlogic S905X Development Board'' on '''CNXSoft'''] :'''Vim''' – 2GB DDR3 RAM, 8GB eMMC Flash, micro SD slot, FE port, :802.11bgn Wi-Fi/BT 4.0 ([[AMPAK]] AP6212 module) :'''Vim Pro''' – 2GB DDR3 RAM, 16GB eMMC Flash, micro SD slot, FE port, :802.11abgn/ac Wi-Fi/BT 4.2 ([[AMPAK]] AP6255 module) <!-- :Vi Lite: 1GB/8GB - [[AMPAK]] AP6181 :Vi: 1GB/8GB - [[AMPAK]] AP6212 :Vim: 2GB/8GB - [[AMPAK]] AP6212 :VIM: 2GB/16GB - [[AMPAK]] AP6212 :GVIM: 2GB/16GB - [[AMPAK]] AP6255 --> *[http://mediaplayers.gr/khadas-vim/ ''Khadas Vim Reviews'' on '''MediaPlayers''']
